item.title: Check list to prepare for tech interviews
How I Learned to Stop Procrastinating, & Love Letting Go
item.description: The end of procrastination is the art of letting go. I’ve been a lifelong procrastinator, at least until recent years. I would put things off until deadline, because I knew I could come through. I came through on tests after cramming last minute, I turned articles in at the deadline after waiting until the last hour, I got things done. Until I didn’t. It turns out procrastinating caused me to miss deadlines, over and over.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi!, I’m an Engineer currently working as Software Engineer – II @Uworld and creator for @far-ui. I use this blog to write posts/blogs/notes on various topics in software engineering. I tend to post a new blog whenever I encounter something new and interesting. I also like reading so if you have your own blog or have somehting which you enjoyed reading or if you have any questions/suggestions on any of the post please feel free to DM me on my socials.

item.title: Preferences
item.description: Location I am more inclined towards jobs which require me to relocate out of India as I want to expand my knowledge and experience different cultures but I’ll be more than happy to discuss any opportunity in Hyderabad too. Flexible work timings. Company size : should be ~200+ employees. Colleagues I can learn from. Stocks please!
